mapper.select: select id, name, application_mode, charge_min_condition, charge_max_condition, charge_max_condition_v, charge_min_condition_v, charging_num, normal_charge_a, normal_charge_v, open_heat_condition, open_fan_condition, power_consumption_multiply, system_bar_status, revert_lock_status, auto_temp_control_status, log_status, enable_battery_exception_check, server_heart_beat, enable_battery_b_m_s_exception_check, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from t_ele_param_setting_template where id = #{id}

select id, name, application_mode, charge_min_condition, charge_max_condition, charge_max_condition_v, charge_min_condition_v, charging_num, normal_charge_a, normal_charge_v, open_heat_condition, open_fan_condition, power_consumption_multiply, system_bar_status, revert_lock_status, auto_temp_control_status, log_status, enable_battery_exception_check, server_heart_beat, enable_battery_b_m_s_exception_check, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from t_ele_param_setting_template limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_ele_param_setting_template(name, application_mode, charge_min_condition, charge_max_condition, charge_max_condition_v, charge_min_condition_v, charging_num, normal_charge_a, normal_charge_v, open_heat_condition, open_fan_condition, power_consumption_multiply, system_bar_status, revert_lock_status, auto_temp_control_status, log_status, enable_battery_exception_check, server_heart_beat, enable_battery_b_m_s_exception_check, create_time, update_time, tenant_id) values (#{name}, #{applicationMode}, #{chargeMinCondition}, #{chargeMaxCondition}, #{chargeMaxConditionV}, #{chargeMinConditionV}, #{chargingNum}, #{normalChargeA}, #{normalChargeV}, #{openHeatCondition}, #{openFanCondition}, #{powerConsumptionMultiply}, #{systemBarStatus}, #{revertLockStatus}, #{autoTempControlStatus}, #{logStatus}, #{enableBatteryExceptionCheck}, #{serverHeartBeat}, #{enableBatteryBMSExceptionCheck}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{tenantId})
mapper.update:
update t_ele_param_setting_template
name = #{name},
application_mode = #{applicationMode},
charge_min_condition = #{chargeMinCondition},
charge_max_condition = #{chargeMaxCondition},
charge_max_condition_v = #{chargeMaxConditionV},
charge_min_condition_v = #{chargeMinConditionV},
charging_num = #{chargingNum},
normal_charge_a = #{normalChargeA},
normal_charge_v = #{normalChargeV},
open_heat_condition = #{openHeatCondition},
open_fan_condition = #{openFanCondition},
power_consumption_multiply = #{powerConsumptionMultiply},
system_bar_status = #{systemBarStatus},
revert_lock_status = #{revertLockStatus},
auto_temp_control_status = #{autoTempControlStatus},
log_status = #{logStatus},
enable_battery_exception_check = #{enableBatteryExceptionCheck},
server_heart_beat = #{serverHeartBeat},
enable_battery_b_m_s_exception_check = #{enableBatteryBMSExceptionCheck},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
where id = #{id}
